Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.2.4:
   Fixes an edge case where context menu would fail if someone had their world in their name.
- 2.1.2.3:
   Adds P12S P2 to the default layout.
- 2.1.2.2:
   Fixes open with not working for examine.
- 2.1.2.1:
   Fixes open with not working for search info.
- 2.1.2.0:
   Adds support for 6.4 encounters in the default layout.
   Swapping headers will now display a mouse icon to indicate you can click on it.
